document_data.name: Turn undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Turn undead''''' is a ''[[channel divinity]]'' cast by nearly all [[cleric]]s. When a cleric casts ''turn undead'' he or she pushes any [[undead]] within a nearby area of five feet in radius back at least fifteen feet, perhaps further depending on the cleric's strength of personality. Undead caught in the blast are momentarily paralyzed or, at the very least, seared by the severe light of the prayer.

Variants.''Turn aquatic undead'': Some [[specialty priest]]s of ocean [[deities]] in the Realms were granted a limited version of ''turn undead'' that could only affect aquatic undead. These included the [[Anchor (specialty priest)|Anchors]] of the [[Church of Umberlee]] and the [[Aquarian]]s of the [[Church of Deep Sashelas]].
